Protocols/LGV_UICleantimeImageViewBasePr.name: totalDays
Protocols/LGV_UICleantimeImageViewBasePr.abstract: The total number of days to display.

Protocols/LGV_UICleantimeImageViewBasePr.name: totalMonths
Protocols/LGV_UICleantimeImageViewBasePr.abstract: The total number of months to display (including years).

Protocols/LGV_UICleantimeImageViewBasePr.name: renderingCallback
Protocols/LGV_UICleantimeImageViewBasePr.abstract: This allows us to directly assign a rendering callback.

Protocols/LGV_UICleantimeImageViewObserv.name: renderingComplete(view:)
Protocols/LGV_UICleantimeImageViewObserv.abstract: This is called when the images have completed rendering.

Protocols/LGV_UICleantimeImageViewObserv.name: LGV_UICleantimeImageViewObserverProtocol
Protocols/LGV_UICleantimeImageViewObserv.abstract: This protocol allows other objects to register as observers, and receive messages from the image view.

Protocols/LGV_UICleantimeImageViewBasePr.name: LGV_UICleantimeImageViewBaseProtocol
Protocols/LGV_UICleantimeImageViewBasePr.abstract: This is a protocol that describes the base class. We use it to make sure that we can override the generatedImage func easily, and allows us to cast to a protocol.

Classes/LGV_UICleantimeDisplayTextLabel..name: beginDate
Classes/LGV_UICleantimeDisplayTextLabel..abstract: The date signifying the beginning of the period.

Classes/LGV_UICleantimeDisplayTextLabel..name: endDate
Classes/LGV_UICleantimeDisplayTextLabel..abstract: The last date. This defaults to today.

Classes/LGV_UICleantimeDisplayTextLabel..name: isShort

Classes/LGV_UICleantimeDisplayTextLabel..name: reportStringClassInstance

Classes/LGV_UICleantimeDisplayTextLabel..abstract: This is text to be displayed if no cleantime.

Classes/LGV_UICleantimeMultipleMedallion.abstract: This is a view class that will display a whole set of cleantime medallions, in a matrix. Each medallion is an image generated by an instance of LGV_UISingleCleantimeMedallionImageView.
